snipe.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to shoot from a hidden position at people who are not protected
snipe.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to criticize someone in a nasty way
snipe.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His former associates have been sniping at him in the press.
snipe.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a bird with a very long thin beak that lives in wet areas
